Detailed Description

HostIniFile class for Host Build configuration storage and reading from ini-File

usage: HostIniFile inifile = HostIniFile("apoxi.ini"); // the inifile goes to <drive>:<Documents and Settings><user name><Application Data> the_port = inifile.ReadInteger("IrDA-Settings", "COM-Port"); String a_string = "1000...2500\0"; inifile.WriteString("Debug-Settings", "DbgOutRange", a_string.GetCString());

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

HostIniFile::HostIniFile (  String  inifilename,
BOOLEAN  on_desktop = FALSE
) 
 

Use HostIniFile() to create an ini-File or read from the IniFile

Parameters:
inifilename name of ini-File, if no full qualified path is specified, the file is placed into "Application Data" directory (<drive>:<Documents and Settings><user name><Application Data>)
If for easier editing the Desktop location is desired, set on_desktop to TRUE, default is FALSE

HostIniFile::~HostIniFile (   )
